service.autostart_title: Autostart the service on program load
service.log_autoclear_title: Clear the service log before each giveaways search
service.connection_error: Unable to get established connection with the service
service.steam_login: Sign in to Steam (Sign in for the second time with remember this device checkbox to save the session)
service.login_steam_title: Auto login with Steam OAuth (need to restart program)
service.ua_title: You can change it in file ../giveawayjoinerdata/user-agent.txt
service.need_login: no data from net (login to Steam)
service.data_ajax: Your IP via Ajax request (click update data to check)
service.data_axios: Your IP via Axios request (click update data to check)
service.data_steam_app_title: App quantity owned on Steam account
service.data_steam_sub_title: Sub quantity owned on Steam account
service.data_steam_dlc_title: DLC quantity to determine in giveaways
service.data_steam_skipdlc_title: DLC quantity without owned base on Steam account to skip in giveaways
service.data_steam_card_title: App quantity with trading cards to determine in giveaways
service.data_steam_trial_title: App quantity giveaways with Alpha/Beta/Demo/Trial key
service.last_win_title: Last 7 winning giveaways stored in file ../giveawayjoinerdata/win.txt
service.have_on_steam: Skipped - already have on Steam account
service.cant_join: Skipped - you're not eligible to join
service.err_join: Skipped - failed to join giveaway due to an error
service.err_offer: Skipped - failed to complete offer due to an error
service.time: Skipped - giveaway does not fit the time to join
service.trial: Skipped - giveaway probably with Alpha/Beta/Demo/Trial key!
service.not_steam: Skipped - giveaway probably not for Steam store!
service.hided: Completed to hide on site giveaways -
service.skipped: Skipped - giveaway does not fit the service settings
service.timer_from_title: Minimum interval obtain a list of hands in minutes
service.timer_to_title: Maximum interval obtain a list of hands in minutes
service.interval_from_title: Minimum delay between entry into giveaways in seconds
service.interval_to_title: Maximum delay between entry into giveaways in seconds
service.intervalfrom_title: Minimum interval between accounts in minutes. 0 - without interval
service.intervalto_title: Maximum interval between accounts in minutes. 0 - without interval
service.pages_title: How many first pages should be checked for the available giveaways
service.points_reserve_title: Reserve of points. 0 - don't reserve points
service.sort_by_level_title: Join giveaways sorted from high to low level
service.sort_by_price_title: Join giveaways sorted from low to high price
service.sort_by_entries_title: Join giveaways sorted from low to high entries quantity
service.min_entries_title: Don't join giveaways where required number of participants less than the selected. 0 - don't consider a participants
service.min_level_title: Don't join giveaways where required level less than the selected
service.max_level_title: Don't join giveaways where required level more than the selected. 0 - don't consider a level
service.min_cost_title: Don't join giveaways with a cost lesser than your set Min. Cost
service.max_cost_title: Don't join giveaways with a cost higher than your set Max. Cost. 0 - don't consider a cost
service.card_only_title: Join giveaways only with trading cards
service.free_only_title: Join giveaways only with 0 points cost
service.cost_only_title: Join giveaways only with more than 0 points cost
service.whitelist_nocards_title: Ignore trading cards, DLC settings for giveaways in Whitelist
service.sound_title: Play sound when winning a giveaway
service.blacklist_on_title: Don't join if giveaway in Blacklist
service.check_in_steam_title: Don't join if the giveaway owned on account
service.check_all_title: Force check giveaways, ignore the saved giveaways data
service.skip_ost_title: If possible, determine Soundtrack giveaways and skip them
service.skip_dlc_title: If possible, determine DLC giveaways and skip them
service.skip_skipdlc: Don't join DLC without base on Steam
service.skip_skipdlc_title: If possible, determine DLC giveaways without owned base on account and skip them
service.skip_trial_title: If possible, determine giveaways with Alpha/Beta/Demo/Trial key and skip them
service.startfrom_title: Start once the service from account number
service.skip_rg: Skipped - offer for another country region
service.dt_err: Account data not found in file

zp.login: (By login-password with save password checkbox, otherwise session won't be saved)
zp.skip_after_title: If can't join in giveaway, checking of other giveaways will be skipped
zp.skip_xbox_title: If possible, determine giveaways for Xbox console and skip them
zp.skip_origin_title: If possible, determine giveaways for Origin store and skip them
zp.skip_epic_title: If possible, determine giveaways for Epic store and skip them
zp.skip_ns_title: If possible, determine giveaways for Nintendo Switch console and skip them
zp.skip_ps_title: If possible, determine giveaways for PlayStation console and skip them
zp.check_all_title: Force check giveaways, ignore the saved time of the last entry

scraptf.sort_by_end_title: Join giveaways sorted from low to high end of time

madjoki.mj_black_title: Don't join if the giveaway in Madjoki Blacklist
madjoki.auto_mj_black_title: Auto add to Madjoki Blacklist if failed to add on Steam account
madjoki.add_game_title: Add to Steam account free Games
madjoki.add_app_title: Add to Steam account free Applications
madjoki.add_dlc_title: Add to Steam account free DLCs
madjoki.add_tool_title: Add to Steam account free Tools
madjoki.add_demo_title: Add to Steam account free Demos
madjoki.add_pack_title: Add to Steam account free Packages
madjoki.add_video_title: Add to Steam account free Videos
madjoki.add_series_title: Add to Steam account free Series
madjoki.add_music_title: Add to Steam account free Musics
madjoki.add_media_title: Add to Steam account free Medias
madjoki.add_cfg_title: Add to Steam account free Configs

indiegala.steam_only_title: If possible, determine giveaways and join only for Steam store
indiegala.join_qty_title: Join giveaways no more than the specified quantity of times for multiple join
indiegala.multi_join_title: Multiple join to the same giveaway the specified quantity of times, if possible
indiegala.sort_by_level_title: Join giveaways filtered from high to low level
indiegala.reserve_on_sbl: Spend reserve on filter by level
indiegala.reserve_on_sbl_title: Spend reserved points when giveaways filtered by level
indiegala.reserve_for_smpl: Spend reserve when no filter by level
indiegala.reserve_for_smpl_title: Spend reserved points when giveaways not filtered by level
indiegala.reserve_no_multi: Not spend reserve on multiple join
indiegala.reserve_no_multi_title: Not spend reserved points for giveaways with multiple join
indiegala.ending_title: Join giveaways before the end of which less than the specified time. 0 - don't consider a time ending
indiegala.ending_first_title: First of all without filter by level join giveaways before the end of which less than the specified time
indiegala.sbl_ending_ig: Ignore settings for filter by level
indiegala.sbl_ending_ig_title: Ignore giveaways ending (hours) settings for filtered giveaways by level

opiumpulses.maxcost_title: Don't join giveaways with a cost higher than your set Max. Cost. 0 - don't consider a cost
opiumpulses.ignore_free_title: Ignore trading cards, DLC settings for giveaways with 0 points cost
opiumpulses.remove_ga_title: Remove already joined giveaway, if you own giveaway in Steam or giveaway in Blacklist

steamgifts.ending_title: Join giveaways before the end of which less than the specified time. 0 - don't consider a time ending
steamgifts.free_ga_title: Join giveaways with 0 points cost, ignoring Min. Cost settings
steamgifts.hide_ga_title: Hide on site, if you own giveaway in Steam (use site option)
steamgifts.remove_ga_title: Remove already joined giveaway, if you own giveaway in Steam
steamgifts.sort_by_copies_title: Join sorted from high to low number of copies in one giveaway
steamgifts.sort_by_chance_title: Join giveaways sorted by winning chance
steamgifts.min_chance_title: Min. Chance to join in giveaways. 0 - don't consider a chance
steamgifts.card_first_title: First of all join in giveaways with trading cards
steamgifts.multiple_first_title: First of all join in giveaways with copies more than one
steamgifts.ignore_on_wish_title: Ignore level, cost, chance, number of entries settings for giveaways from the wishlist page
steamgifts.reserve_on_wish_title: Spend reserved points in giveaways from the wishlist page
steamgifts.whitelist_first_title: First of all join giveaways in Whitelist
steamgifts.wishlist_first_title: First of all join in giveaways from the wishlist page
steamgifts.wishlist_only_title: Join giveaways only from the wishlist page
steamgifts.ignore_on_group_title: Ignore level, cost, chance, number of entries settings for giveaways from the groups page
steamgifts.reserve_on_group_title: Spend reserved points for giveaways from the groups page
steamgifts.group_first_title: First of all join in giveaways from the groups page
steamgifts.group_only_title: Join giveaways only from the groups page

profile.autostart_off_title: Disable autostart for all services on program load
profile.start_minimized_title: Minimize to tray on program load
profile.autoscroll_title: Scroll down on a new entry in the service log
profile.steam_local_title: Don't update data App and Sub owned on Steam account from net
profile.dlc_local_title: Don't update data to determine DLC in giveaways from net
profile.skipdlc_local_title: Don't update data to determine DLC without owned base on Steam account from net
profile.card_local_title: Don't update data to determine App with trading cards in giveaways from net
profile.trial_local_title: Don't update data App giveaways with Alpha/Beta/Demo/Trial key from net
profile.timer_view_title: Display the remaining time until the next giveaways search
profile.devmode: Enable/Disable open DevTools on program load
